content.query:
-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

--1a. how many familyMembership does an individual have
SELECT
    DISTINCT(COUNT(fm.individual)) AS indiv_per_fam_count
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
WHERE fm.individual IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY  fm.individual
ORDER BY indiv_per_fam_count DESC;

--2b. who are thoes individuals that do not have family members
SELECT
   fm.individual,
   COUNT(fm.individual) AS indiv_per_fam_count
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
WHERE fm.individual IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY  fm.individual
HAVING COUNT(fm.individual) < 1







SELECT
    COUNT(fm.individual) as indiv_per_fam_count
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY  fm.individual;

--2a. how many individuals per family count distribution
SELECT 
    DISTINCT(COUNT(fm.individual)) as indiv_per_fam_count
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY fm.family
ORDER BY indiv_per_fam_count;

--3a. how many individuals per family count
SELECT 
    COUNT(f.city) as indiv_per_city_count
FROM silver.Individual i
LEFT JOIN silver.FamilyMembership fm ON (i.individual_id = fm.individual)
LEFT JOIN silver.Family f ON (f.family_id = fm.family)
GROUP BY COUNT(f.city);
